member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.RuntimeContractsAttribute
member.summary: This assembly-level attribute is added to an assembly after the rewriter has processed it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract
member.summary: Microsoft-compatible CodeContracts class.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Requires(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise.
member.exception: Throws RequiresException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Requires(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise with the given message.
member.param: The message thrown in the exception.
member.exception: Throws RequiresException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.RequiresAlways(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise.
member.exception: Throws RequiresException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.RequiresAlways(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise with the given message.
member.param: The message thrown in the exception.
member.exception: Throws RequiresException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Assume(System.Boolean)
member.summary: At runtime the behaviour is the same as an assertion. At static verification time, these conditions are added to the list of facts. Throws AssumeException if the assumption is ever violated.
member.exception: Throws AssumeException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Assume(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: At runtime the behaviour is the same as an assertion. At static verification time, these conditions are added to the list of facts. Throws AssumeException with the given message if the assumption is ever violated.
member.param: The message thrown in the exception.
member.exception: Throws AssumeException if the condition fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Assert(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks a condition at the given program point, throws AssertException if
member.exception: Throws AssertException if the assertion fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Assert(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise with the given message.
member.param: The message thrown in the exception.
member.exception: Throws AssertException if the assertion fails.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Invariant(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies an invariant property of a class. Throws Invariant exception if violated.
member.exception: Throws InvariantException if the condition is ever violated.
member.remarks: This contract function works but is not automatically inserted after each public method as described in the MS documention. IL rewriting is required to function as described.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Invariant(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Requires the condition to be true, throws RequiresException otherwise with the given message.
member.param: The message thrown in the exception.
member.remarks: This contract function works but is not automatically inserted after each public method as described in the MS documention. IL rewriting is required to function as described.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Ensures(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ensures the given condition is true at method termination, throws EnsuresException otherwise.
member.exception: Throws EnsuresException if the condition is violated at the end of the method.
member.remarks: This contract function is currently a no-op since it requires IL rewriting to function properly.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Ensures(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Ensures the given condition is true at method termination, throws EnsuresException otherwise with the given message.
member.exception: Throws EnsuresException if the condition is violated at the end of the method.
member.remarks: This contract function is currently a no-op since it requires IL rewriting to function properly.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.EnsuresOnThrow``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ensures the given condition is true at method termination, throws EnsuresException otherwise.
member.remarks: This contract function is currently a no-op since it requires IL rewriting to function properly.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.EnsuresOnThrow``1(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Ensures the given condition is true at method termination, throws EnsuresException otherwise with the given message.
member.param: The error message to throw if cond does not hold.
member.remarks: This contract function is currently a no-op since it requires IL rewriting to function properly.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.EndContractBlock
member.summary: A marker function to indicate the end of a legacy contract block.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.ForAll``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Predicate{``0})
member.summary: Ensures the given predicate is satisfied for all elements of the collection.
member.typeparam: The type of the element in the collection.
member.param: The predicate that must be satisfied.
member.returns: Returns true if all elements satisfy the predicate, false otherwise.
member.remarks: public int [] Foo<T>(T[] xs){ CodeContract.Requires(CodeContract.ForAll(xs , (T x) => x != null) );

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.ForAll(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Predicate{System.Int32})
member.summary: Ensure the predicate is true over the given range of integers. The integers provided range over: [inclusiveLowerBound, exclusiveUpperBound).
member.param: The lower bound of the range.
The upper bound of the range (excluding this value).
The predicate that must be true over the given range.
member.returns: Returns true if the predicate is true over the range, false otherwise.
member.remarks: public int [] Foo(String [] xs){ CodeContract.Requires(CodeContract.ForAll(0, xs .Length, index => xs[index] ! = null ));

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Exists``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Predicate{``0})
member.summary: Ensures the given predicate is satisfied for at least one element of the collection.
member.typeparam: The type of the element in the collection.
member.param: The predicate that must be satisfied.
member.returns: Returns true if any element satisfies the predicate, false otherwise.
member.remarks: public int [] Foo<T>(T[] xs){ CodeContract.Requires(!CodeContract.Exists(xs , (T x) => x == null) );

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.Exists(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Predicate{System.Int32})
member.summary: Ensure the predicate is true over the given range of integers. The integers provided range over: [inclusiveLowerBound, exclusiveUpperBound).
member.param: The lower bound of the range.
The upper bound of the range (excluding this value).
The predicate to test over the given range.
member.returns: Returns true if the predicate is true for any value in the range, false otherwise.
member.remarks: public int [] Foo(String [] xs){ CodeContract.Requires(!CodeContract.Exists(0, xs .Length, index => xs[index] == null ));

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.RequiresException
member.summary: Exception thrown by Requires* functions.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.RequiresException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct an instance with the given message.

member.summary: Exception thrown by Invariant* functions.

member.summary: Construct an instance with the given message.

member.summary: Exception thrown by Ensures* functions.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.CodeContract.EnsuresException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct an instance with the given message.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractInvariantMethodAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as an object invariant. When IL rewriting is supported, this method will be called at the end of every public method and getter.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.PureAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as being "pure", with no side-effects.
